name: Dragonet
tagline: The universal Minecraft server, that supports both MC:PC and MC:PE clients!
body:
### Welcome to the Dragonet Website!

##What is Dragonet?
Dragonet is a Minecraft server software that supports both Minecraft: PC Edition, and Minecraft: Pocket Edition. It currently supports: A vast majority of Bukkit plugins, multi-world, world generation, placing/destroying blocks. It is currently maintained by @TheMCPEGamer, and the Dragonet Team.

#Downloads:
0.0.1:

[Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/s/2t9jnogla875j1w/dragonet-0.0.1-beta-all.jar?dl=0)

Beta Downloads: 

There are currently no Beta versions of Dragonet yet!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
